ticketSale.title: Ticket Sale Schedule
ticketSale.description: Ticket sale dates are automatically calculated based on your showings:
ticketSale.saleStarts: Sale starts: 7 days before the earliest showing
ticketSale.saleEnds: Sale ends: 1 hour before the earliest showing
ticketSale.note: Individual showings can have their own ticket sale schedules in the next step.

help.maxTicketsPerOrder: Set the maximum number of tickets a customer can purchase in a single order

showings.title: Event Showings
showings.description: Add multiple showings for your event (different times/dates)

text.title: Create Event Description with AI
text.description: üí° Enter specific instructions and creative hints to generate an attractive marketing description.
text.placeholder:
üí° Creative example:
‚Ä¢ Emphasize unique networking opportunities
‚Ä¢ Highlight guest speakers/artists
‚Ä¢ Create FOMO with limited tickets
‚Ä¢ Emphasize exclusive experiences
‚Ä¢ Mention early bird discounts
text.tipText: The more specific you are, the better the AI output will match your needs.

templates.workshop: Create an energetic learning event description focused on networking, expert speakers and limited tickets.
templates.concert: High-energy concert description with star artist, spectacular lights, romantic moments for couples and early bird discounts.
templates.tech: Tech conference with top speakers, exclusive insights on AI/Trends, startup networking and product demos.
templates.night: Magical music night with top artists, stunning lights, romantic atmosphere and early bird offers.

toasts.emptyPrompt: Please enter a prompt for description
toasts.callError: An error occurred while calling the AI. Please try again.

labels.location: Where will your event take place?

errors.showingRequired: At least one showing with start time is required
errors.maxTicketsMin: Maximum tickets per order must be at least 1
errors.maxTicketsMax: Maximum tickets per order cannot exceed 20
errors.startTimePast: Start time cannot be in the past
errors.endTimePast: End time cannot be in the past
errors.endTimeBeforeStart: End time must be after start time
errors.ticketSaleStartPast: Ticket sale start cannot be in the past
errors.ticketSaleStartBeforeShowing: Ticket sale must start before the showing
errors.ticketSaleEndPast: Ticket sale end cannot be in the past
errors.ticketSaleEndAfterStart: Ticket sale end must be after start date
errors.ticketSaleEndBeforeShowing: Ticket sale must end before the showing starts
errors.showingDurationTooShort: Showing duration must be at least 30 minutes
errors.ticketSaleStartTooLate: Ticket sale must start at least 2 days before showing
errors.ticketSaleEndTooLate: Ticket sale must end at least 1 day before showing
errors.ticketSaleWindowTooShort: Ticket sale window must be at least 6 hours
errors.ticketSaleWindowTooLong: Ticket sale window cannot exceed 90 days
errors.showingTimesOverlap: Showings must be at least 1 hour apart
errors.duplicateShowingTime: Cannot have two showings with the same start time
errors.ticketSaleStartRequired: Ticket sale start time is required
errors.ticketSaleEndRequired: Ticket sale end time is required

hero.title: Vietnam's Leading Event Ticketing Platform
hero.subtitle: Connecting attendees with amazing event experiences, from music and sports to conferences and much more.

mission.title: Why was VieTicket created?
mission.content: VieTicket was born with the mission to democratize event access in Vietnam. We believe everyone deserves great event experiences, regardless of where they are or what they do. From concerts, conferences, workshops to sporting events - everything should be easy to find, book and attend.

vision.title: Vision 2030
vision.content: To become the #1 entertainment and event super app in Southeast Asia, where every memorable experience begins.

fastBooking.title: Quick booking
fastBooking.description: Just a few clicks and you'll have tickets to your favorite events.

security.title: Absolute security
security.description: Personal information and transactions are protected with modern encryption technology.

eTicket.title: Convenient e-tickets
eTicket.description: E-tickets on your smartphone, no need to worry about losing paper tickets.

aiPersonal.title: AI personalization
aiPersonal.description: Smart AI system suggests events that match your preferences.

support.title: 24/7 support
support.description: Customer support team is always ready to help you anytime, anywhere.

diverse.title: Diverse events
diverse.description: From music, sports to business - thousands of events waiting for you to explore.

2024.title: Idea Born
2024.description: VieTicket idea was conceived by a team of students passionate about technology and events.

2025.title: In Development
2025.description: Currently actively developing the platform with smart ticketing and event management features.

2026.title: Launch & Expansion
2026.description: Target official launch, serving thousands of events and expanding to multiple provinces.

team.title: The people behind VieTicket
team.subtitle: A team passionate about technology and events, committed to creating amazing experiences for users.

faq.title: You might need to know
faq.subtitle: The most frequently asked questions from VieTicket users

booking.question: How to book event tickets?
booking.answer: You can search for events, select tickets and pay online through VieTicket website or app.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel or exchange tickets?
cancellation.answer: Cancellation/exchange policy depends on each event. Please see details in the 'Terms' section of each event.

eticket.question: Are e-tickets safe?
eticket.answer: VieTicket e-tickets are encrypted with QR codes and have a strict authentication system, ensuring absolute security.

organizer.question: How to become an event organizing partner?
organizer.answer: You can register for an Organizer account and send your registration via email business@vieticket.com or contact our hotline.

faq.notFound: Can't find the answer? Contact us directly
